snippet.title: VOTE!!! The Game Trailer
snippet.description: From the creators of the bestselling and award winning Infinity Blade series, play as President Obama or Mitt Romney in a slapstick battle for the White House.  Equip your candidate of choice with a variety of iconic American outfits, accessories and items.  Use your skills to unlock multipliers, win votes and rack up the top score as you campaign for victory.  Who will win the presidency? On this campaign trail, both popularity and skill matter, so join now and VOTE!!!
